sourcesContent:
Test Results Dashboard

ID Level Name Topic Final Grade
{{ test.id }} {{ test.level }} {{ test.name }} {{ test.topic }} {{ test.finalGrade }}

Grade Distribution

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user-test-result-view', templateUrl: './userTestResultView .html', styleUrls: ['./userTestResultView .css'] }) export class UserTestResultView { tests = [ { id: 1, level: 'Beginner', name: 'Math 101', topic: 'Algebra', finalGrade: 'A' }, { id: 2, level: 'Intermediate', name: 'Science 201', topic: 'Physics', finalGrade: 'B' }, ]; // Pie chart settings public pieChartOptions: ChartOptions = { responsive: true, }; public pieChartLabels: Label[] = ['A', 'B', 'C', 'D', 'F']; public pieChartData: SingleDataSet = [0, 0, 0, 0, 0]; public pieChartType: ChartType = 'pie'; ngOnInit() { this.calculateGradeDistribution(); } calculateGradeDistribution() { let gradeCounts = { 'A': 0, 'B': 0, 'C': 0, 'D': 0, 'F': 0 }; for (let test of this.tests) { if (gradeCounts.hasOwnProperty(test.finalGrade)) { gradeCounts[test.finalGrade]++; } } this.pieChartData = Object.values(gradeCounts); } }
